item.title: #TIL 2017-02-23 : english, database, quote, testing, til, phpunit, mysql, php, mistake
item.description: MYSQL UNION vs UNION ALL The difference is UNION command will sort and remove duplicated rows (RETURNED ONLY DISTINCT ROWS) Examples : mysql> select '1', '2' union select '2', '1' union select '3', '4' union select '1', '2'; +---+---+ | 1 | 2 | +---+---+ | 1 | 2 | | 2 | 1 | | 3 | 4 | +---+---+ 3 rows in set (0.00 sec) mysql> select '1', '2' union select '2', '1' union select '3', '4' union select '1', '3'; +---+---+ | 1 | 2 | +---+---+ | 1 | 2 | | 2 | 1 | | 3 | 4 | | 1 | 3 | +---+---+ 4 rows in set (0.
